item.title: Skupper and Gitops
item.description: Skupper enables service communication, transparently, across multiple hybrid Kubernetes clusters. For more information about Skupper, as well as documentation and great examples, please visit https://skupper.io/. This article will demonstrate how to setup and maintain a Virtual Application Network (VAN) using Skupper. The standard documented approach for setting up a Skupper network, is through the use of its Command Line Interface (CLI) tool named skupper. Following the documentation and some examples, you will connect your network through a set of imperative commands that are used to initialize and connect your network.
